experience.jobDescription: As part of Consumer Apps orchestration layer, I support all orchestrarion layer in NodeJS with ExpressJS and HapiJS and we provide REST and Graphql api for our clients

I worked mostly with Java to develop API, but, I have time to work with frontend with AngularJS
